data.title: About Us - Pranjal Projects
data.snippet:
# About Us

## About Pranjal Projects

Founded in 1980, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. has established itself as a leading name in the sheet metal fabrication and infrastructure industries. With over 40 years of excellence, we are ISO 9001:2008 and RDSO certified, known for delivering high-quality steel bridges, Pre-Engineered Building (PEB) solutions, and large-scale infrastructure projects.

Beyond our expertise in infrastructure, Pranjal Projects is also a trusted manufacturer of earth-moving equipment parts, boilers, and heavy engineering equipment for the oil and gas sector. Our advanced steel fabrication capabilities allow us to serve diverse industries, providing precise, durable solutions that meet the rigorous demands of these sectors. [...] With a robust portfolio of successful projects and state-of-the-art facilities, Pranjal Projects remains at the forefront of engineering excellence, delivering comprehensive solutions that drive India’s infrastructure growth and support critical sectors like oil and gas and heavy machinery.

#### Mission

Deliver high-quality structural steel solutions through exceptional service and customized approaches that exceed customer expectations, fostering trust and long-term success.

#### Vision

To shape India’s infrastructure by delivering quality, innovative projects that drive the nation’s progress towards becoming a global powerhouse.

#### Values [...] #### Values

Integrity in all interactions, innovation through cutting-edge solutions, a commitment to sustainability with eco-friendly practices, especially in renewable energy, and excellence in meeting global standards to create lasting value.

## Promoters

#### H.C. Bhatia

Chairman

#### Vekas Bhatia

Managing Director

#### Deepak Bhatia

Managing Director

#### Aryan Raj Bhatia

Director

data.title: Pranjal Projects | LinkedIn
data.snippet: Welcome to Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd., a beacon of excellence in sheet metal fabrication since 1980. Our commitment to continuous improvement is embodied in the principles of Kaizen, ensuring that every aspect of our operations is refined for optimal efficiency and quality. Specializing in high-rise steel buildings, bridges, metro systems, airports, and railway construction, Pranjal Projects is also a distinguished manufacturer of parts for cranes and the OEM industry. From precision-engineered buckets and skids to intricately crafted cabins and chassis, our expertise extends across a diverse range of products. Pranjal Projects is proud to be an ISO-certified company, exemplifying our unwavering dedication to maintaining the highest standards in every endeavor.   + Structural steel solutions for infrastructure projects like steel bridges and railway stations.
  + Fabricated components for earth-moving equipment and heavy machinery.
  + Heavy engineering equipment, including boilers, pressure vessels, and storage tanks for industries such as oil, gas, and power.

###### Company Details

 Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd.

Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. 

Engineering Consultant

Open Position

Company Description

Pranjal Projects Pvt Ltd was originally founded as a partnership firm in 1980 by H.C. Bhatia and was incorporated as a private limited company in 2002. It is now promoted by H.C. Bhatia and his sons, Vikas and Deepak Bhatia. The company is an Indian infrastructure and fabrication firm specializing in structural steel solutions for a diverse range of industries.

Established date

While the company was founded as a partnership firm in 1980, it was formally incorporated as Pranjal Projects Private Limited on May 13, 2002. [...] Certification and technology: The company is an ISO-certified firm that uses advanced technology, such as robotic and laser-guided welding, and adheres to OHSAS safety practices. It is also an approved provider for railways and bridges by the Research Designs and Standards Organisation (RDSO).

data.title: Pranjal Projects
data.snippet:
# Ethical & Innovative Steel Solutions

With over 45 years of expertise, Pranjal Projects Pvt. Ltd. stands as one of India’s leading infrastructure and fabrication companies. From the steel that builds India’s tallest structures to precision-engineered components that power heavy machinery, we are committed to excellence, innovation, and sustainable growth.

As the largest Pre-Engineered Building (PEB) supplier and an RDSO-approved provider for railways and bridges, we deliver comprehensive solutions that span multiple sectors, ensuring the success of projects across India.

Read More

years of expertise

tons of steel fabricated yearly

#### 10,000+

projects executed

India’s largest Pre-Engineered Building supplier [...] India’s largest Pre-Engineered Building supplier

RDSO approved for railways and bridges

State-of-the-art, fully automated plant with Industry 4.0 technology

Key clients include NHAI, AAI, Bullet Train Projects, Metro Stations, and more
